channel.title: EA announces Battlefield Play4Free
channel.description:
[url]https://ve3d.ign.com/articles/news/57866/Battlefield-Play4Free-Announced-For-PC[/url] [quote] Battlefield Play4Free, a deep PC shooter featuring signature Battlefield vehicular warfare, sandbox gameplay and intense 32-player online battles. With its advanced graphics, polished production values, depth and realism, Battlefield Play4Free takes the genre to the next level and is positioned to compete with top console titles.
“We broke new ground in 2009 with the launch of Battlefield Heroes; a game that has 6M registered players worldwide. Now we are complementing that arcade shooter with a core, realistic Battlefield shooter experience that fans have been clamouring for,” said James Salt, Senior Producer, Battlefield Play4Free. “Battlefield Play4Free is for serious shooter fans who are looking for a premium – but free – experience that rivals top console titles.”
Combining the most popular maps from Battlefield 2 with the familiar classes and powerful weapons of Battlefield: Bad CompanyTM 2, players have access to 16 vehicles including the Mil Mi-28 attack helicopter, its nemesis the F35 VTOL jet fighter, the massive Russian T-90 main battle tank, and the hard to catch LSV light strike vehicle. Players progress through the game to learn new combat skills, and earn in-game currency to spend on a massive array of devastating weapons and equipment. [/quote] [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tlCPhYZfy3g&feature=player_embedded[/url]
It looks to be BF2 with maybe updated graphics and gameplay, perhaps?

item.title: EA announces Battlefield Play4Free
item.dc:creator: eternalness
item.description:
Got the closed beta yesterday, it looks like BF2 with slightly better textures and effects and some new guns. But its buggy as hell, can’t seem to get it to run @ 1920x1080 in fullscreen mode and it took forever to finally connect to a match.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
Bluemen230:

Hahahaha
EA is giving stuff away for free and Activision is charging $180 for a single game
What happened to the world?

Activision knows all of the smart people will wait for the Battle Chest.

Then they’ll drive up the price.

Assholes.

item.dc:creator: Shnazliztur
item.description:
I loved BF2 when it first came out. I spent around $200 going to sponsored LAN parties, at first sucked, then made up a few weeks later and won a $1000 tournament & an awsome gaming rig at the time. But it croaked a few weeks after, F***ing Compaq. Ehhh… well those were some good times. Too bad its not gonna be on consoles.
